content: single_crochet below skip 3 chain* repeat from * until the second last single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 221 double_crochet + 36 single_crochet + 74 chain per side + 6 double_crochet 2 chain in the middle 22 aaaaand we are done i hope you enjoyed making your shawl as much as i enjoyed designing it if you liked this pattern please go ahead and share your ongoing or finished work in instagram with the tag #oolongteashawl cheers this pattern is released under the creative commons nd 4 0 license this means that among others you can use this pattern to make your own finished items even for commercial purposes but you cannot produce and share any modifications of this pattern without my written permission you can find the whole license details at https //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/4 0/legalcode https //www instagram com/red teapot atelier/ https //www etsy com/shop/redteapotatelier 23
